data_table.name: TOPMed_WGS_GenSalt_Subject
data_table.study_name: NHLBI TOPMed: Genetic Epidemiology Network of Salt Sensitivity (GenSalt)
data_table.description: The subject consent data table contains subject IDs and consent group information.

variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

stats.enum: Disease-Specific (High blood pressure and related cardiovascular-renal disease, IRB) (DS-HCR-IRB)
Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

stats.enum: Disease-Specific (High blood pressure and related cardiovascular-renal disease, IRB) (DS-HCR-IRB)
